title: Manufacturer Journey
subtitle: Guided end-to-end path for DPP creation, compliance validation, EDC handover, and post-flow feedback.
sessionResumeHint1: Last run ID is persisted in local storage.

payloadHint: Include aas_identifier and product_name for best compliance results.
